metadata.name: Intro
metadata.value:
We are OMP, a game changer that optimizes supply chains of the world’s leading companies with our very own smart software and services.  

Are you passionate about global employer branding, social engagement, and lead generation? Are you dedicated to marketing and talent acquisition? And looking for a temporary new challenge that highlights your many talents?
Roll up your sleeves and become our Employer Branding Specialist from December until the end of May 2024.

metadata.name: Profile
metadata.value:
A bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications, human resources, or a relevant field.
+3 years of experience in recruitment, human resources, marketing or advertising.
You’re a natural storyteller who enjoys connecting with diverse audiences to craft compelling messages. 
Experience in organizing campaigns, programs, and events that build brand awareness and generate qualified leads, all the way from strategy to execution.
Knowledge of the latest social media and online marketing trends as you live on social media and understand how to attract followers and keep them engaged.
Expertise in placing and developing postings on Facebook, LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, and other job boards.
Strong organizational and project management skills. 
Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.

metadata.name: Bonus Points (Profile)
metadata.value:
The ability to create various content forms, from blogs to emails to videos.
An interest in technology, always seeking innovative ways to improve processes and results.
Experience with employee advocacy software or application tracking systems.

metadata.name: Your Future
metadata.value: At OMP, we’re eager to find your best career fit. Our talent management program supports your personal development and empowers you to build a career in line with your ambitions.

metadata.name: Your Team
metadata.value: As our new Employer Branding Specialist, you’ll be part of the Marketing & Communications team. Our team engages the conversation with internal and external stakeholders. We shape our communications and build the OMP brand.

title: Employer Branding Specialist (Temporary)
content:
As a temporary Employer Branding Specialist, you help us tell OMP’s story to build our employer brand. You promote the work and life at OMP to attract great candidates who fit our culture and support our mission.
You are responsible for:

Managing the global employer brand to build awareness and engage followers.
Establishing and building a collaboration with an employer branding agency to develop an EVP
Launching an awareness campaign on social media.
Collaborating with partners like Glassdoor and Indeed to help build OMP's global brand awareness.
Tracking, measuring, and analyzing the results of each action to see what is and isn’t working, and adapting for maximum impact.
Managing and monitoring the employer branding budget.
Coordinating all employer branding related content both internally and externally to target our talent audience.
Ensuring the career site and other recruitment channels are up to date at all times.
Creating content for recruitment events and ordering event materials.
Overseeing and optimizing the candidate and employee experience.
Amplifying internal ambassadors and generating employee referrals.

You make big things happen while working closely together with Talent Acquisition, Marketing & Communications, and the internal business departments. You collaborate with external agencies, universities, and other partners.
